name: EOS Global Expansion
description: Eos is Asia’s leading provider of outsourced employment solutions. Under a model known as PEO ( Professional Employer Organization ), or GEO ( Global Employer Organization ), we hire your staff as employees into our own local company in your target country, so you don’t need to register your own subsidiary. We manage all of the payroll, tax, and HR functions that require expert local knowledge. Your team then oversee the employees day to day activities as usual – You can focus on your business objectives and leave the rest to us.
features: Everyday alignment of organizational, team and individual goals
Personalized insights and nudges to drive power performance behaviors
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Navigating the complexities of global expansion is our expertise.
ShortDescription: Hire staff quickly & compliantly, without the cost, delays, or resource drain of setting up a foreign subsidiary
enhanced_description: EOS Global Expansion offers outsourced employment solutions under a PEO (Professional Employer Organization) or GEO (Global Employer Organization) model, primarily serving Asia. The service enables companies to expand globally by hiring staff directly into EOS's local entities in target countries, eliminating the need for clients to establish their own foreign subsidiaries. EOS manages all critical payroll, tax, and HR functions that require expert local knowledge, allowing client teams to focus on day-to-day employee oversight and core business objectives. This approach facilitates rapid and compliant international hiring, significantly reducing the costs, delays, and resource drain typically associated with setting up foreign operations.
